RETURNDATA.OVERVIEW_CONTENT: Managing all roles and their access rights

ITEM_DATA.ITEM_DESCRIPTION: To view role details click on role link in the roles table, you will get all role details like the name and all role access rights.
Click on 'New' role button then enter role name and press on 'Save' button you will find then the role has been added to the roles table.
Select the role you need to delete from the roles list and then click on delete button
To edit role select the role you want to edit from the roles list, make your changes you want then press on 'Save' button

To assign an access right to a role, select the role and click on 'Add Access' button, a window will open then select an entity from entities comobox then select one of the items from entities items combo box a list of rules entities will be loaded, select the rules entities from the table by checking the check boxs infront of the rules entities then press on 'Add Access Right'
Select the role from roles list then from list box of role access rights, select the access rights you want to remove then press the 'Remove Access' button
